channel.title: Game crash at map bm_c2a2c (Apprehension, I think)
channel.description: Hi. As soon as I reach the map [b]bm_c2a2c[/b], the game crashes. I have attached the MDMP file. Processor - AMD Phenom II X4 955 GPU - Radeon HD 5970 RAM - 6 GB Motherboard - ASUS Crosshair IV Formula Any fix for this? hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_28T18_22_7C0.mdmp (84.5 KB)

item.title: Game crash at map bm_c2a2c (Apprehension, I think)
item.dc:creator: tjohns113
item.description:
crysisftw:

Hi.

As soon as I reach the map bm_c2a2c, the game crashes.

I have attached the MDMP file.

Processor - AMD Phenom II X4 955
GPU - Radeon HD 5970
RAM - 6 GB
Motherboard - ASUS Crosshair IV Formula

Any fix for this?

I just had this exact same problem happen to me. I would also like to know if there is a fix?

Read full topic
